Pietro De Nicolao Software Engineer @ Bending Spoons S.p.A.
Work Bending Spoons (2019 â€“ present) Software Engineering Lead of the Algorithmic Trading team.
FLYToons (2017 â€” 2019) Designing, implementing and deploying the distributed software components enabling the control of autonomous drone fleets. In particular, I worked on:
 remote drone control using the MAVLink protocol (Python); 3D modeling of drone trajectories and lights (Blender, Python); automated configuration management of the drone fleet (Ansible); system administration on embedded Linux platform (Raspbian and Armbian OS); test flights and data analysis; tuning, configuring and fixing the open-source PX4 flight firmware; setup and maintenance of the VCS and CI infrastructure.
